Template¶

created

2019-04-26

author

Leandro (Cerberu1746) Benedet Garcia

class panda_core_data.template.Template(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that will be used to make ModelTemplates

classmethod __init_subclass__(template_name=False, template_group_name='DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP', auto_create_group=True)¶

Method that automatically registers class types into data_core

Parameters

  • cls (Model) – class type to be added

  • template_name (str) – The name of the template, if not supplied, the class name is used

  • template_group_name (str) – Name of the group that the template type will be added. If it doesn’t exists, it will be created.

static __new__(cls, *_, **__)¶

Method that handles the instancing of the models and templates, this is necessary because dataclasses create a custom __init__ method. Which we doesn’t use at all if a raw file is supplied.

Parameters

  • cls (class that inherits from Model or ModelTemplate.) – the type to be instanced

  • path (str) – path to the raw file to be loaded, if False, the class will be instanced like a normal dataclass
